review: He is surely a great doctor ! Looking forward to a quick recovery and permanent knee pain relief . Thanks!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been privileged to meet. Dr. Biren treated my mother as if I was a family member during all my meetings with him, before Surgery, and after. The surgery was undoubtedly successful, and the results were as described. He and his team specially Anita Ma’am has always been around for any doubts, queries, support that we needed during the process and ensured that my mother gets good post-surgery care. These people have earned my trust and loyalty. I highly recommend this office for all orthopedic care.”

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would recommend Dr Biren to all my friends and family. I was in terrible knee pain since December 2020. No pain killers helped me. I visited him on 1st January 2021 and again on 4th with some tests and xray . He suggested physio and within a week my pain had reduced significantly. I have completed more than 6 weeks of physiotherapy now and I feel like getting back to my day to day life. His approach is really good. Moreover he listens to his patients. He writes very clearly and mentions everything nicely in his prescription. He explains the problem and solutions in detail. Doesn't asks for unnecessary tests or give a lot of medicines. My words can't be enough to describe how wonderful the dr and my whole experience has been. I am filled with blessing and gratitude that I found him soon enough. Thankyou doctor!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** *** *** **** ** ******** **** ***** *** ******* He got done ultra sound , MRI, all the path tests. Blood tests. 
Recommend Physio therapy at his clinic which I went for.  ******* ******* 

I switched to another doctor when I was recommended a TB medicine by Dr Nadkarni even in the absence of any related symptom or test reports. 

** ******* **** ** ****** ****** ****** *** ********* ******* ******* ********** ****** ** **** *** ******* ** ********* ****** **** ******* ******** **** ***** *** **** ** ********* ** ********* **********

review:
I am very happy with the treatments prescribed by Dr. Nadkarni. I have been associated with him for last couple of years. He is very humble. In fact his entire staff is very nice and helpful. Always greets you with a pleasant smile. 
Thank you.

tags: None
review:
I would like to say few words on behalf of my Mother Mrs. Zaibun Nisa. My mother had severe deformity in her both knees. I searched and met several Knee replacement Surgeons in Delhi for the best treatment. Finally I met Dr. Biren in Sita Ram Bhartiya Hospital. His tremendous understanding about what factors correlate with long term success of TKR as well as his strong clinical and research history impressed me a lot. Finally we decided for both TKR of my mother by Dr. Biren Nadkarni. We are highly satisfied with this operation and my mother has completely recovered from deformity and knee pain and performs her daily works normally. 
In my opinion Dr. Biren is a Scholar as well as highly respected & noble surgeon who has dedicated his academic career to the advancement of Joint Replacement and Patient Care. He is a talented surgeon who has a dynamic personality and is a superstar of Patient Satisfaction. 
We are very Thankful  to him & have Tons of respect for him as a Surgeon and human being. 
Sultan Ahmad Saifi

tags: None
review:
Paid a visit to Dr.Biren since I had a Fracture in my right hand's middle finger..(Malunited Proximal Phalanx)
I was impressed by the sheer Knowledge, Professionalism, Work Commitment and Patience he possesses.. His willingness to give time and insight to ur problem and subsequent Diagnosis only adds to your satisfaction.. He's highly qualified from the most reputed instuitions of our country and has done commendable research work and Fellowship Internationally in the field Of Orthopedics.. 
Anyways his Work speaks for all of the above.. I'll without doubt consult him for any Orthopedic issues in future..
He consults SitaramBhartia, Rockland, Fortis Cdoc Hospital and CygnusOrthocare..apart from his own Clinic..
Would strongly recommend him without second thought..

tags: Value for money,
review:
The fee of Rs 1000/- for super citizen is too high.
The advise was so so commonly known. Extra expenditure of Rs 1500/- on X-Rray by other agency Sanya Diagnostics Hous Khas was also too high who didn’t grant me CGHS concession even when I showed my CGHS CARD no: 888077- Pensioner and they are on CGHS panel. Reason given was that payment has been already made and can’t be reversed. They should have also display ‘CGHS Panelisation’ at the reception and the reception should have disclosed to the patient before accepting much higher charges.
I wish this aspect be taken note of so that many more patients in this regard may not be unwarrantedly and unwaveringly charged higher amount disregarding their CGHS approved  charges.
Ik Ahluwalia

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am very happy with Dr Nadkarni. 
He has the very necessary kind of bedside manner, that every good doctor should have. 
He performed bi lateral knee replacement for me. 
I have almost recovered. His attention to me, while I was in hospital, was exemplary. 
My surgery was in November 2019.
I am also very happy with my subsequent follow up visits, where he gave me patient hearings. 
He also attended to me via online consultation after lockdown. 
I would recommend Dr Nadkarni, for sure to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I hurt my left knee and right ankle very late in the evening, and it was foggy, cold and dark. My GP requested him to delay closing up, as he was sending me to him. Once we reached his clinic, his staff just took over under his guidance. He came to look at my foot in the car and his staff took me to a diagnostic laboratory across the street for the X-Ray and back, expediting things. They understood my pain and my mother's helplessness. They collectively went beyond the call of duty. He explained my condition well, warned me against taking it lightly but, didn't dissuade me from travelling the next day, as I was adamant. Even though he had suitably instructed and equipped me, I paid heed to his advise and did not travel. I would strongly recommend him to people based on my first experience. He reminded me of the renowned but, kind orthopaedic doctors (Dr.Tuli & Dr.Abbott), I had to see during my school days for injuries. I am, as yet, recovering but, very thankful to him.
